name: Wheelhouse
description: A tiny houses rental platform, where we've worked as a team to implement dynamic search engine which locates rental availability via Mapbox geolocation API.

name: Tourbook
description: Tourbook is a management app for touring bands.  A coordination tools to ensure good logistics and efficient travel. For schedule management and to better appreciate locations and their assets.  Create tours, events and your dream team.

name: This amazing website
description: Did this as an exercice, trying to reproduce with my own tools the work of Web Dev Brittany Chiang.
